name: Rage
description: In battle, you fight with primal ferocity. On your turn, you can enter a rage as a bonus action.
benefits: Advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws
Bonus damage on Strength-based melee weapon attacks (see Rage Damage column)
Resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage
limitations: Cannot cast or concentrate on spells while raging

early_end_conditions: Turn ends without attacking hostile creature or taking damage since last turn
mechanics.action_type: bonus action to start or end
mechanics.uses: Number shown in Rages column per long rest

name: Unarmored Defense
description: While you are not wearing any armor, your armor class equals 10 + your Dexterity modifier + your Constitution modifier. You can use a shield and still gain this benefit.

name: Danger Sense
description: You gain an uncanny sense of when things nearby aren't as they should be, giving you an edge when you dodge away from danger.
benefits: Advantage on Dexterity saving throws against effects that you can see
limitations: Must be able to see the effect

name: Reckless Attack
description: You can throw aside all concern for defense to attack with fierce desperation.

mechanics.trigger: When making first attack on your turn
benefits: Advantage on melee weapon attack rolls using Strength during this turn
drawbacks: Attack rolls against you have advantage until your next turn

name: Primal Path
description: You choose a path that shapes the nature of your rage.

name: Primal Knowledge
description: You gain proficiency in one skill of your choice from the list of skills available to barbarians at 1st level.

name: Extra Attack
description: You can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

name: Fast Movement
description: Your speed increases by 10 feet while you aren't wearing heavy armor.

name: Feral Instinct
description: Your instincts are so honed that you have advantage on initiative rolls.

additional_feature.description: If surprised at combat start and not incapacitated, you can act normally on first turn if you enter rage first
additional_feature.requirement: Must enter rage before any other action

name: Instinctive Pounce
description: As part of the bonus action you take to enter your rage, you can move up to half your speed.

name: Brutal Critical
description: You can roll additional weapon damage dice when determining the extra damage for a critical hit with a melee attack.

name: Relentless Rage
description: Your rage can keep you fighting despite grievous wounds.

mechanics.trigger: Drop to 0 hit points while raging (not outright death)
mechanics.effect: Make Constitution saving throw to drop to 1 HP instead

dc.reset: DC resets to 10 after short or long rest

name: Persistent Rage
description: Your rage is so fierce that it ends early only if you fall unconscious or if you choose to end it.

name: Indomitable Might
description: If your total for a Strength check is less than your Strength score, you can use that score in place of the total.

name: Primal Champion
description: You embody the power of the wilds.
